author: Lisa Ryan
title: Turmeric Might Not Have Magical Theraputic Powers After All
text: It wasn’t long ago that we were all singing the praises of turmeric’s apparent magical healing powers (and sprinkling the golden-yellow spice on just about everything we eat and drink). But now, a major study has found that there’s no evidence that turmeric’s main chemical component — curcumin... More »
